title: Gangplank early game
body: Should i just farm with q or play agressive with barrels, bcoz i cant do both until i have trinity force and i can kill minions with one barrel

replies.body:
Nah you just take bandit (mastery) and Q the enemy for free gold.

EDIT: And the above is from like anyone who actually knows how to play GP, and should be in the majority of guides, so i don't understand really how this is a question.
